content.text:
# Pradip Kumar Sunuwar

Pradip Kumar Sunuwar () is a Nepalese politician, belonging to the Nepali Congress Party. Sunuwar serving as the Minister for Health  of Koshi Province. He also serves as a member of the Koshi Provincial Assembly and was elected from Okhaldhunga 1(A) constituency. Sunuwar had served as the Minister for Water Supply, Irrigation and Energy of Koshi Province.
